column1: Note: South African Lifter Liz Odendaal in the 75 kg class has tested positive for Steroids and Ephedrine following this contest. and is suspended for period of two years commencing June 18. 97. Australian lifter Phoebe Woods in the 60 kg is erased from the results. because a few weeks before the contest she was tested positie in Australia. All other tested lifters were negative.
